attributes.action: make it a legal requirement that a hygiene certificate be displayed in all places serving food.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every council carries out food hygiene inspections and gives a rating between zero and five based on the hygiene conditions. Many restaurants receive zero stars with problems such as "poor hygiene conditions" and "major non-compliance with food legislation". 

At the moment, display of the star rating is not compulsory and as a result, many people are eating at places where the food could be potentially unsafe without knowing.

The hygiene certificate should be on display in the restaurant/shop/café/pub in clear view so that people can make an informed decision about where to eat.
